info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 6:23AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Spotty Light Freezing Rain May Cause Slippery Travel This Morning... A light wintry mix of precipitation, including some freezing rain, is possible through the next few hours as temperatures hover near or just below freezing. Snow and ice amounts are expected to be light, but could produce slippery roads and sidewalks given cold pavement temperatures. Temperatures should rise above freezing by mid-morning, with any remaining precipitation falling as rain. Use caution if traveling this morning, and keep a safe distance between you and the vehicle ahead of you. Remember, it only takes a light glaze of ice to create hazardous driving conditions.
